snippet: The music business partners Jimmy Iovine and Dr. Dre gave $70 million to the University of Southern California to start an academic program for the development of creative entrepreneurs.
abstract: Record producer Jimmy Iovine and his business partner Dr Dre are giving $70 million to University of Southern California to create degree that blends business, marketing, product development, design and liberal arts; hope to start academic program for development of creative entrepreneurs.
lead_paragraph: The music business partners Jimmy Iovine and Dr. Dre gave $70 million to the University of Southern California to start an academic program for the development of creative entrepreneurs.

headline.seo: Dr. Dre and Jimmy Iovine Start U.S.C. Program
headline.main: Two Musical Minds Seek a Different Kind of Mogul
headline.print_headline: Two Musical Minds Seek Different Kind of Mogul
